name: fard simulator [alpha]
description:
This is fard simulator, and here some info.

- account system:

it works, only locally. meaning you cant save your data and load it on another device

press "save" to save your data (obviously) put in your username and password, (just in case someone else uses ur device and does something), and press load to load it.

report bugs in the comments, i found a few too late cuz i didnt playtest
